text: Sickle and Hammer () is a 1921 Russian silent drama movie directed by Vladimir Gardin.Серп и молот (1921)Серп и молот (1921) It stars Aleksandr Gromov, Anatoli Gorchilin, and N. Zubova. ==Actors== * Aleksandr Gromov as Ivan Gorbov * Anatoli Gorchilin as Pyotr * N. Zubova as Agasha * Vsevolod Pudovkin as Andrey == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian silent movies Category:Movies directed by Vladimir Gardin Category:1921 drama movies
title: Sickle and Hammer (movie)
